Class FESI.Data.JSGlobalWrapper 

FESI.Data.JSWrapper
   |
   +----FESI.Data.JSGlobalWrapper
public class JSGlobalWrapper
extends JSWrapper
implements JSGlobalObject
Package an EcmaScript object as a JSObject for use by the Netscape like interface. Specialled for the global object.

JSGlobalWrapper(GlobalObject, Evaluator)
Create a JSGlobalWrapper object over the global object

makeBeanWrapper(Object)
Mark an object as a bean, restricting its access by FESI scripts to the public bean methods and properties.
makeJSArrayObject()
Make a new array object.
makeJSObject()
Make a new object based on a given prototype (which may be null).
makeJSObject(JSObject)
Make a new object based the object prototype object.
makeObjectWrapper(Object)
Package any object as an EcmaScript object, allowing to use it for example with an "eval" function, where it becomes the 'this' object.
toString()
Display the string value of the contained object

JSGlobalWrapper 
 public JSGlobalWrapper(GlobalObject go,
                        Evaluator evaluator)
Create a JSGlobalWrapper object over the global object

Parameters:
go - the EcmaScript global object
evaluator - the Evaluator

makeObjectWrapper 
 public JSObject makeObjectWrapper(Object object)
Package any object as an EcmaScript object, allowing to use it for example with an "eval" function, where it becomes the 'this' object.

Parameters:
object - The object to wrap.
makeBeanWrapper 
 public Object makeBeanWrapper(Object object)
Mark an object as a bean, restricting its access by FESI scripts to the public bean methods and properties.

Parameters:
object - The object to wrap as a bean.
makeJSObject 
 public JSObject makeJSObject()
Make a new object based on a given prototype (which may be null). The object is of class Object and has initially no property.

Returns:
A new object
makeJSObject 
 public JSObject makeJSObject(JSObject prototype)
Make a new object based the object prototype object. The object is of class Object and has initially no property.

Parameters:
prototype - An object to use as prototype for this object
Returns:
A new object
makeJSArrayObject 
 public JSObject makeJSArrayObject()
Make a new array object. The object is of class Array and is empty (length 0).

Returns:
A new object
toString 
 public String toString()
Display the string value of the contained object

Returns:
The string value
Overrides:
toString in class JSWrapper
